name: Flight Game!!
description:
Welcome to Flight Game!! You control Tia, a girl flying through the sky with her winged backpack. Collect stone octahedrons, dodge flying rocks, fly through rings and shoot down enemy monsters!

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Space - Shoot (shoot flying rocks to freeze them in place)
  • Mouse - Look
  • M - Mute Music
  • Enter - Start Game
  • 1 - Start Hard Mode (you fly faster with less health!)

Created as part of university coursework in C++ by @AyoMakesArt on Twitter.
